ack.p: We wish to acknowledge Dr. Simon D. W. Frost for his insightful and helpful feedback on earlier versions of this manuscript. We also wish to recognize Dr. Tanja Stadler, whose excellent presentation on phylogenetic clustering at the 22nd International HIV Dynamics and Evolution meeting in Budapest was the inspiration for this study; and Dr. Joshua Herbeck for providing details on the clustering methods used in the study of HIV-1 clusters in Seattle. we wish to acknowledge a similar study that was posted on bioRxiv during the production of this manuscript, at https://www.biorxiv.org/content/early/2017/11/10/215491.
